definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Surface activity groups of dusts affect their biological effects.
sentences.chinese: 矿物粉尘表面活性基团影响粉尘的生物效应。

sentences.english: Again, molecules of these detergents have a hydrophobic portion and a hydrophilic one.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这种清洁剂既有亲水基团又有疏水基团。

sentences.english: Again, molecules of these detergents have a hydrophobic portion and a hydrophilic one.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这种清洁剂既有亲水基团又有疏水基团。

sentences.english: Many groups of PTT have been investigated in order to find their contributions to the melting process.
sentences.chinese: 研究了PTT分子链段中各基团对熔融过程的贡献。

sentences.english: Acid anhydride groups are grafted onto ABS molecular chains by reaction processing.
sentences.chinese: 用反应加工的方法可在ABS分子链上接枝酸酐基团。

sentences.english: Structure resembles uracil with an attached bromine group.
sentences.chinese: 带有溴基团的结构与尿嘧啶相似。

sentences.english: The effect of the electron-donating groups on the electronic spectrum was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了给电子基团对电子吸收光谱的影响。

sentences.english: These groups may be substituted in the phenyl ring.
sentences.chinese: 这些基团有取代的苯环。

sentences.english: An aromatic hydrocarbon group formed by the removal of a hydrogen atom from an arene.
sentences.chinese: 由芳烃去掉一个氢原子形成的芳香碳氢基团。

sentences.english: A group contribution model for calculation of partial molar volumes of organic solutesin dilute aqueous solution has been established.
sentences.chinese: 建立计算无限稀偏摩尔体积的基团贡献模型。

sentences.english: Main chain composed of alternating silicon and oxygen atoms in the silicon atoms with organic groups.
sentences.chinese: 主链由硅氧原子交替组成，在硅原子上带有有机基团。

sentences.english: The main way to change these systems is altering the polymer groups.
sentences.chinese: 调整这一体系的主要途径是改变其中的聚合物基团。

sentences.english: Systems substituted with electron-withdrawing or electron-donating groups provided similar results.
sentences.chinese: 系统替代电子退出或电子基团提供了类似的结果。

definition: cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
